mapper.select: SELECT `user`.UserId, `user`.UserName, USER.UserAccount, `user`.UserEmail, UserPhone, `user`.UserStatus, `user`.Department, `user`.Position, `user`.CreateTime, role.RoleType FROM `user` LEFT JOIN userrole ON userrole.UserId = `user`.UserId LEFT JOIN role ON userrole.RoleId = role.RoleId WHERE `user`.UserId = #{userId}
